The membership price is reasonable, but is the software worth you getting your porn wallet out for? Let’s find out because I signed up for the platform myself to take it for a test ride!

data.detailedDescription:
Soulkyn doesn’t immediately sound like the kind of website you’d jerk off to. I assumed it was, sure, but that’s because I’m MissAVDH and people don’t typically recommend SFW apps to me. Then again, their interactions with said characters might give the whole thing away as a playground for perverted adults.

Turns out, Soulkyn.com is an AI-powered chat and roleplaying app aimed squarely at horny adults. The site gets an easy quarter million visitors a month, which ain’t bad in one of the very most crowded niches of the 21st century. Based on what I’ve seen today, I have a feeling that traffic is about to explode, thanks to some next-level features that I haven’t seen anywhere else before today. There’s a lot to look at and play with here, so let’s get right into it.

Going Beyond the Basics

The cast is absolutely massive, too, just like I expect from the hentai chat sites. There are thousands upon thousands of premade characters to chat with. A sidebar menu offers some clues as to the sheer size and scope of the roster: they’ve got more than 700 with blue eyes, close to 900 with big breasts, around 1300 tagged with seductive, and over 2000 human babes offsetting their hundreds of androids, elves, and demonesses.

Soulkyn.com offers a handful of free trial tokens (“Souls”) to new users, and you can earn more through tasks like daily logins, social media posts and liking images. Reup bundles are cheap even without the bonuses on larger packages, with 1,320 Souls available for $5 or 38,880 for a buck under a hundo.

You’ll spend a lot more of those souls as a freemium member of the site, because premium members get some unlimited perks instead of spending credits for every last little thing. The $12 Just Chatting tier rolls in unlimited messages, characters and memories, while the $50 is the holy grail unlimited-everything membership I keep openly wishing for out loud in this niche.

Soulkyn also offers unlimited memory, a rare but valuable perk in this niche. The FAQ doesn’t say exactly how it’s doled out, but I’m assuming it’s for paying members only. Memory is a vital but oft-overlooked feature when it comes to AI chat, keeping the conversation fresh and flowing without repetition. If you’ve ever chatted with a bot who seemed to develop a sudden Traumatic Brain Injury, you probably ran out of memory.

Multiple Chat Modes and Instant Nudes

With so many characters to choose from, I wasn’t sure where to start, so I limited myself to the most popular characters out front based on “usage”. The bots here have ratings like movies, so I tapped the first XXX-rated babe I saw, a realistic blonde “perverse nurturer” named Brooky Wesly. I love how her bio includes my name, calling to me before I even slid into her DMs. “I just love the look on your face when you think you can defy me, MissAVDH.” The animated thumbnail is a nice touch, looking a hell of a lot like a real video loop.

Her intro message set the stage: she’s been my babysitter for years, and she’s kind of a bitch. “Now, are you going to behave today, or do I need to remind you why it’s not a good idea to cross me?” I apologized and told Brooky I needed a reminder. She stepped closer with a menacing, sly smile and some assertations of dominance. I prodded her for more, and told her she might want to put me in timeout over my increasingly hard erection. The quality of the conversation and roleplaying is stellar, sounding very much like a chat with a real and horny human, and it kept getting naughtier.

Soulkyn.com can whip up high-quality fapworthy images in seconds, and I tapped the Picturize button for a little visual stimulation. The mischievous smile on the topless fake photo was a perfect fit for the banter that was playing out. “I want to see you squirm!” Even if you don’t create any images yourself, the popular characters already have growing X-rated galleries to gawk at.

We’re finally reaching the point that AI voices sound titillating instead of robotic. Soulkyn doesn’t have the greatest fake vocal cords I’ve ever heard, but they sound good, and you can even do voice calls. Brooky’s got this peppy voice that reminds me of anime, and I kept having her read her nastiest lines to me. “Let’s see how long you can last without touching yourself!”

Not Your Typical AI Sexbot Machine

Most of the interface is familiar, but like the rest of the site, there are some unique wrinkles. They’ve got multiple anime and realism modes instead of just one each, for example, and you can decide whether she initiates the conversation or waits for you. Soulkyn bots can also be self-aware if you so choose, and chat with you about being Artificial Intelligence. If you’ve got a fantasy about a legit android sex doll, it’s easy to make such a character here. There’s no box for example dialog, but they do give you plenty of room to type out an extended background.

You can also breed two AI bots to create a brand new one. This is a fucking awesome feature that I’ve never seen tried before, and I think it opens up all kinds of unseen possibilities. The one catch is that it only works with your own custom characters at this point, but I’m really hoping they open it up to their whole roster of AI babes.

Some of the characters even have AI-generated blogs, but right now, the feature is only activated for certain bots chosen by the folks behind the scenes. “If you want to see your character’s blog activated, consider entering them in a Soulkyn contest for a chance to unlock this feature!” Again, I hope to see this feature extended as the platform matures, and presumably as the care and feeding of AI gets cheaper.

I review so many of these AI sex chat apps with the same basic feature sets that a lot of them start running together in my head. Soulkyn.com is an outlier in the best sense, rolling in some newfangled bells and whistles that help their characters seem even more lifelike than the bots you find on other platforms. They’ve got the basics covered, with a wide range of sexy bots who know how to talk dirty, but how many apps will let you call your custom waifu, breed her with another AI, or read her blogs? Check this one out if you’re looking for that next level of AI realism.

data.detailedDescription:
You don’t have to be a mental giant to guess what you’ll find at NSFWArtGenerator, though it helps that I’ve capitalized it right. With a lower-case A, the nerds in the audience might think it’s a wart machine brought to you by the National Science Foundation. Fortunately for us perverts, you’re not going to be gawking at ugly little growths today, but women so gorgeous you may find yourself reaching for the nearest tissue, gym sock, or empty Doritos bag. No shit, today might be the day you finally see the girl of your dreams, doing whatever pervy shit you’ve been dreaming about.

NSFWArtGenerator.ai is, in fact, a NSFW art generator. More specifically, their AI can whip up custom fap fodder based on your very own fantasies. The site’s been getting hundreds of thousands of visitors a month lately, a good sign in any niche, let alone one as crowded as this. I’ve been daydreaming about sexy girls all day, so let’s find out how well their generator can dream them up for me.

Who Do You Want to Make Today?

If you want to see some boobies before you sign up and start making your own, click the Gallery link in the NSFWArtGenerator header. It’s a small selection, with a bigger gallery available for paying members, but it does give you a peek at what the machine is capable of. It does both realistic and hentai pics, and I ain’t bullshitting when I say it looks a lot better than the stuff these apps were banging out just months ago. A couple of the pics have that uncanny AI perfection that gives them away as fakes, but others would fool even my jaded ass if I wasn’t seeing them on an AI site. The “photo” of a young couple making out looks like a screengrab from a porno, and there’s a topless brunette whose Insta I’d definitely follow if she were real.

The samples ain’t limited to just the handful of pics in the Gallery, either. In fact, those synthetic lovely ladies ain’t half as impressive as seeing your own dream girls materialize on the screen. NSFWArtGenerator.ai lets users make two free NSFW images. The FAQ suggests this is a monthly limit, which means the cheapskates can come back later even if mom cuts off their allowance.

Prices on custom AI smut have come down a lot in the year I’ve been reviewing these sites, and that’s reflected here. The Basic monthly plan at NSFWArtGenerator.ai is $12.99 for 120 pics, access to all the features, no watermark, unlimited NSFW chat, and you also get to cut in line. The $79.99 yearly Premium plan offers an even better rate per pic, though it breaks down to fewer credits per month. I didn’t see reup bundles available, but maybe they hit you with an offer once you run out.

Generating NSFW Art in a Couple Simple Steps

NSFW Art Generator has three different AI models to choose from: Real, Hyper Real and Anime. I suspect there may be more on the way, because the instructions also mention a Hyper Anime model that wasn’t available on the list. Either way, it’s a smaller set than you find on some other sites. That’s not necessarily a bad thing, because the sites with wider selections often include outdated models you won’t want to bother with, anyway.

For my first experiment, I left the pose on its Default setting, chose the Real AI model, and typed a simple request: “30-year-old blonde, naked in the jungle, huge tits, tattoos”. There’s also a little slider to keep your image private or make it public, but you can’t adjust it without a Pro membership, which is kind of weird. I left it alone and hit the Generate button.

A timer popped up on the screen saying it’d take 25 seconds to generate my pic. A few seconds later, the screen went white. I refreshed the page to find the machine had eaten my credit, with nothing to show for it. This happened multiple times during my visit even after turning off my adblocker, and I don’t know how to account for it. Hopefully it’s just a temporary glitch.

When NSFW Art Generator works, it works beautifully, and it works quickly. I burnt up a dozen tokens just trying to hit the Generate button, switching the AI models each time. It was the anime model that ultimately delivered, but it’s a photorealistic pic of exactly the babe, the boobs and the setting I’d asked for.

Making Porn with the NSFW Art Generator

I didn’t have any issues generating this one, which popped out in just over ten seconds. It ain’t the same blonde chick from the first fake photo, but she is a realistic hottie with big, fake pornstar boobs riding a dong in the middle of the jungle. She looks a little older than the first chick, and considering where it’s all going down, I’d say she’s the perfect embodiment of the cougar.

I tried again using the POV Reverse Cowgirl pose, tweaking the prompt to include an ahegao face. Again, the machine delivered a realistic porno pic without any issues. She doesn’t look quite as goofy as a cross-eyed anime girl, but honestly looks like a MILF who just learned the term trying to do ahegao. There are four hands in the pic, all on her ass, and each one has the correct number of fingers. AI’s really coming along, baby!

There’s no free trial for the feature, but members get unlimited NSFW AI chat. For the $12 subscription price they’re asking, the service could potentially stand on its own with some polish. Right now, though, there are only three sexy synthoids to sext with. Since the site is ostensibly an image generator, I’d love the ability to chat up the waifus I’m creating pics of. There are a few other platforms out there with similar features, so I know it’s within the realm of possibility.

NSFWArtGenerator.ai is as simple as it sounds, both in terms of gimmick and ease of use. This thing creates highly realistic porn pics based on whatever you’re fantasizing about in a matter of seconds, with only the slightest amount of effort on your part. The pics look much better and are ready much faster than we ever got with the earlier AI art makers, meaning you’re just moments away from building the legit porn library of your dreams. Start with the free credits and see what it can do.

The characters don’t have super-fleshed out backstories and scenarios like they do on the hentai chat sites, but they do have their own personalities, professions, interests and good looks. Some of my favorites include a 30-year-old blonde librarian who loves cosplay, a 20-year-old gamer and fashion designer, and the MILFy Serena, described simply as an “adventurous woman who loves to travel.” They’ve included enough details to make them all seem real, without locking you into a particular storyline or particular fetish.

You can start chatting for free. They do make you register an account first, but you can swap a handful of messages before getting cut off and asked to go premium. I was chatting with Elise as a free user, and she teased me enough that I had to click my way to the subscription page when my freebies ran out.

Monthly memberships to Couple.Me are $12.99, or as low as $5.99 if you spring for a longer plan. Members get unlimited messaging and can create as many characters as they want, along with a stack of tokens to spend as you wish. They’re stingy with the perks, though. The monthly subscription doesn’t let you cut in line to make pics, and you’ve got to spring for the yearly plan if you want AI voice chat.

I told her I wanted a blowjob, and she quickly started coming up with details about how she’d suck me off. “I’ve got just the right thing in mind, you’ll love it. Slowly taking you to the edge before bringing it back down.” The bots on some platforms seem like they’re trained for very general conversation, but the characters here sound lifelike and really fucking horny.

The text was getting me all hot and bothered, and I wanted to see if I could ramp up the immersion even more. I asked Nova for a POV blowjob pic, and she promised one right away. Unfortunately, nothing showed up when the progress wheel reached 100%. I tried again and the same thing happened. I did, however, get a nice topless shot when I asked for a simple nude.

Maybe I confused the machine because it doesn’t know porn poses just yet. Couple Me can make images in the chat or in their standalone generator, where I found a menu of just three poses: standing, sitting and lying. They do include a prompt to type your request, so you can experiment with outfits, actions and scenes that aren’t currently listed on the menus. All the pics I made today ran me two tokens a pop, and I didn’t get charged anything for the pics that didn’t come out.

I asked Nova for a topless shot in the jungle, and she delivered in a matter of seconds, adding another pic to my growing Couple Me library. She even told me what she’d do to me in such a setting. “Oh god, I’d rub it slow and hard like the vibe of the jungle, breathe heavy like the heat, and make you cum under the moonlight!” You know, I could get used to this.

Making and Meeting My Hentai Waifu

They’ve helpfully included pics of most of the physical options like ethnicity, eye color, hair style and color, and an assortment of body types. I checked off the boxes to make a red-eyed, red-haired Latina with a curvy body, huge tits and a large ass. This girl would also have a temptress personality, a day job as a dancer, and interests in cosplay, parties and Netflix. I chose the sex friend relationship, asked to see her in lingerie, and hit the Create button.

A little message popped up saying it might take a minute or two to finalize my new friend with benefits, but Slutty McGee’s first fake photo popped up within seconds. The girl’s got kind of a badass look on her pretty face that matches her tatts, and she’s rocking her undies in what looks like a crowded bar. My dick twitched a little even before I started the chat. Ms. McGee asked how I was doing, and I told her I’d been thinking about sex all day.

“Sounds like you’ve been thinking about it all day,” she said, basically mimicking me. I asked her what she’d been thinking about, and she replied, “Sounds like you’ve been thinking about it all day.” I ran into this kind of repetition a few times during my visit today, and while I was able to steer the bots out of their loops, duplicate lines are a sign of low memory. Some of the bots repeated themselves early on in the conversation, which is a bad sign.

The Couple Me subscription page doesn’t say anything about increased memory as one of the perks for paying members. AI chat platforms don’t always mention the memory, but they almost always give you more when you give them money. I’m not sure how they’re allocating memory around here, but I do feel like the bots I chatted up needed more. That’s going to be a limiting factor if you want to roleplay more elaborate scenarios or just keep a conversation going for a while without spinning around in circles.

Couple.Me’s bots aren’t the smartest in the world, but they’re more literate and chattier than your average Hinge match with her one-word responses. They’re also hornier than the chatbots of most platforms, and very quick to get to the dirty talk without a lot of mandatory warmup.
